problem.display_name: Multiple Choice with Hints and Feedback
problem.markdown:
>>What is the role of Gorilla Mux? <<
( ) Provides HTTP client and server implementations {{well, this is the role of net/http.}} () Handles errors for http servers (x) Implements a request router and dispatcher for matching incoming requests to their respective handler

multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the role of Gorilla Mux?

choicegroup.choice: Provides HTTP client and server implementations well, this is the role of net/http.
Implements a request router and dispatcher for matching incoming requests to their respective handler
